<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3149</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Roots Questionaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wurzeln Questionaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Racines Questionaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Raizes Questionaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Radici Questionaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωτηματολόγιο ριζών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Raíces Questionaire</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a student questionnaire and is part of a project where students explore their roots and produce a family tree.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">roots</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">questionaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">family tree</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Kursteilnehmerfragebogen und ist 
ein Teil eines Projektes, in dem Kursteilnehmer ihre Wurzeln 
erforschen und einen Stammbaum produzieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un questionnaire d'étudiant et fait partie
d'un projet où les étudiants explorent leurs racines et produisent 
un arbre de famille.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um questionário do estudante e é parte 
de um projeto onde os estudantes explorem suas raizes e produzam uma 
árvore de família.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un questionario dell'allievo e fa parte 
di un progetto dove gli allievi esplorano le loro radici e producono 
un albero di famiglia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα ερωτηματολόγιο σπουδαστών και είναι 
μέρος ενός προγράμματος όπου οι σπουδαστές ερευνούν τις ρίζες 
τους και παράγουν ένα οικογενειακό δέντρο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es un cuestionario del estudiante y es parte
de un proyecto donde los estudiantes exploran sus raíces y producen 
un árbol de familia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wurzeln</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">questionaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stammbaum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">racines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">questionaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">arbre de famille</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">raizes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">questionaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">árvore de família</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">radici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">questionaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">albero di famiglia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ρίζες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ερωτηματολόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οικογενειακό δέντρο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">raíces</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">questionaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">árbol de familia</string>
          </keyword>
